\begin{align*}
\text{AIC} &= -2l(\hat{\theta}) + 2\text{p} \\
p &= \text{Number of estimated parameters}
\end{align*}

\begin{align*}
\text{BIC} &= -2l(\hat{\theta}) + log(n) \\
n &= \text{Number of observations}
\end{align*}
